title: Phá Gió Đông (Dong Feng Po - Đông Phong Phá)
lyrics: yi zhan li chou gu dan zhu li zai chuang ko wo zai men hou jia zhuang ni ren hai mei zou jiu di ru chong you yue yuan geng ji mo ye ban qing xing de zhu huo bu ren ke zhe wo yi hu piao bo lang ji tian ya nan ru hou ni zou zhi hou jiu nuan hui yi si nian shou shui xiang dong liu shi jian zen me tou hua kai jiu yi ci cheng shu wo que cuo guo shui zai yong pi pa tan zou sui yue zai qiang shang bo luo kan jian xiao shi hou you ji de na nian wo men dou hai hen nian you er ru jing qin sheng you you wo de deng hou ni mei ting guo shui zai yong pi pa tan zou yi qu dong feng po feng ye jiang gu shi ran se jie ju wo kan tou li ba wai de gu dao wo qian zhe ni zou guo huang yan mang cao de nian tou jiu lian fen shou dou hen cheng mo   x2
